snippet: The associations accused France of starting a trade war by announcing a ban on imports of vegetables from the southern Puglia region because of an outbreak of the bacteria xylella fastidiosa.
abstract: Stephane Le Foll, French agriculture minister, announces blockade on imports of vegetables from southern Puglia region of Italy due to bacterial outbreak, which is met by accusations by Italian farm associations that Le Foll is starting trade war.
lead_paragraph: The associations accused France of starting a trade war by announcing a ban on imports of vegetables from the southern Puglia region because of an outbreak of the bacteria xylella fastidiosa.

headline.main: Italian Farm Groups Accuse France of Trade War
headline.print_headline: Italian Farm Groups Accuse France of Trade War
